mapper.update:
update screeninginfo
filmName = #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cinemaName = #{cinemaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hallName = #{hallname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saleTime = #{saletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
releaseTime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ticketNumber = #{ticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unsoldTicketNumber = #{unsoldticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
soldTicketNumber = #{soldticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL},
where screeningNumber = #{screeningnumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update screeninginfo set filmName = #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cinemaName = #{cinemaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hallName = #{hallname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saleTime = #{saletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releaseTime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ticketNumber = #{ticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unsoldTicketNumber = #{unsoldticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, soldTicketNumber = #{soldticketnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL} where screeningNumber = #{screeningnumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT screeningNumber, filmName, cinemaName, hallName, saleTime, releaseTime, ticketNumber, unsoldTicketNumber, soldTicketNumber, price FROM screeninginfo LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
